wikipedia_page.main:
Friedhelm Eronat (born 1953 in Prien Germany, the son of Anna and Josef Eronat, is a Geneva-based millionaire business leader mainly involved in oil trading, exploration and production. Eronat is one of the world's most successful oil dealmakers. His estimated wealth is over $100m (£55m), built on deals in places such as Nigeria, Russia and Kazakhstan.
Eronat studied production management and oil engineering at Nicholls State University in Louisiana, graduating in early 1970s. He then entered the international oil business.
In 2003 Friedhelm Eronat renounced US citizenship and became a British citizen.

response: *Friedhelm Eronat (born 1953), Geneva-based millionaire business leader in oil trading, exploration and production
